website_summaries.verdict: Lipstick with bold color and creamy texture well-loved by customers.
pros: Helps lips look fuller because of its vitamin-rich formula and sheer finish
Choose between satin, metallic, shimmer, or matte style
A little goes a long way, so this lipstick will last you a long time
cons: Some customers reported that this lipstick had a bad smell

customer_reviews.title: Boycott Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, but Amazon supports ICE and is helping to share info to detain “immigrants” so please stop using this app thank you!
customer_reviews.author: shjdjdjs

customer_reviews.title: I bought this lipstick after reading so many great reviews about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lipstick after reading so many great reviews about it. It arrived and from the very first use I have loved this lipstick. It is not sticky or too pigmented, so it looks very natural and neutral while still making my lips look better. It is very light weight and stays on well, I typically only find myself needing to reapply after a meal. I WILL be buying this lipstick again!
customer_reviews.author: Bliss. S

customer_reviews.title: and a perfect work-friendly daytime color
customer_reviews.text: gipsy is sheer, buildable, and a perfect work-friendly daytime color: you get enough color so your face looks finished, but there's nothing dramatic or loud here. NARS calls it a "sheer warm berry" -- don't be put off (or too excited) by the "warm" bit. My complexion is a cool-leaning neutral, and this is a rosy berry color on me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! Such a pretty color! I got lots of compliments today 😍
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and texture of this lipstick. It goes on smooth and never gets on my teeth. It kinda feels more like a gloss. the only downside is that I have to reapply about halfway through the day. I get many compliments while wearing it. I have a fair skin type.
customer_reviews.author: kristin russ

customer_reviews.title: Well, it's Nars... it says it all.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality, as usual. They never fail you. I wish, though, there would be color sample outside on the tube so I don't have to open it every time to see what's inside (I have plenty and they're all unmarked. There is a name - in words - on each tube, but it would be so convenient to just have a color sticker). Other than that, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amaluna

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick, great price!
customer_reviews.text: While this lipstick's actual color is slightly lighter in person than it is in the photo, it still looks great when applied for a subtle neutral lip look. It's reasonably long lasting for a sheer lipstick, and at this price, why pass it up?
customer_reviews.author: M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Color Different Than Pictured &  Initially Dry But Very Good
customer_reviews.text: The color of Belle de Jour is closer to a matte, light coffee than to the tangerine in the picture. I uploaded my own photo but you can do a Google search and see others. At first the lipstick was somewhat dry and difficult to apply and it didn't last long. Over time it softened and now goes on more easily and lasts longer. Because it's the most golden of my lipsticks, I tend to use it twice a week and shine it up a bit with Nars Orgasm gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous ConsumerTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: NARS Tanganyika
customer_reviews.text: On me it's a little darker than sheer, and my skin is caramel. It's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: K Goldbie

customer_reviews.title: Great nude for my skin color.
customer_reviews.text: I am light skinned with rosey undertones and dark blond hair and blue eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lipstick is available although discontinued by NARS
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad you still have Mayflower NARS lipstick in stock. I know it has been discontinued and that’s disappointing. Quality of lipstick is great
customer_reviews.author: B. Sikes

customer_reviews.title: Light and summery color
customer_reviews.text: Love Devotion is halfway between lip gloss and lipstick. Its softer than most lipsticks so it gets used up faster. It looks like a bright coral orange in the tube but its much more natural on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Anaeee

customer_reviews.title: Nice lipstick - not great
customer_reviews.text: Good lipstick, with a pretty color. Not great. It doesn't last very long. Great sellers!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to buy this lipstick...due to my skin tone...but it works! It is a shade of red with a bit of coral in it..not a blue-red but a yellow-red. It is bright! I usually apply once and the color lasts a long time. This is not a 'looks like I don't have lipstick on' shade. Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: books-aholic60

customer_reviews.title: Nars has the best reds
customer_reviews.text: It's impossible to decide so I basically have them all. I had to get a lipstick organizer. I like the sheer ones they're easier to control for a daytime look. This tanganyka seems to work well with any winter outfit
customer_reviews.author: Mermaidshopper

customer_reviews.title: The color is not quite as dark as I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is not quite as dark as I expected, and doesn't really build, but it is the most moisturizing lipstick I have ever tried!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my color.
customer_reviews.text: I read good reviews, so I bought it. I am fair-medium, beige undertones. This color is almost invisible on my lips. On the bright side, it does not bleed, smells fine, and it is a high quality lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer 20201

customer_reviews.title: Love this lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: Love NARS! Love the feel and the coverage. Beautiful shade too. One of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi S

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: NARS Barbarella Lipstick. This is just a light peach color , it think it really will suit better on fair skin . As a dark-skinned woman (NW40 MAC) I can achieve the color, making a base for my lip first with loose powder an applying the lipstick over it, then i apply a coral lip-gloss ( Revlon papaya looks well). For the price I was expecting a really really great formula, I think this is just Ok, mostly over priced, is just creamy, but nothing special... About the seller, shipped fast, arrived in good conditions no complains about it. Good Service.
customer_reviews.author: Carms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this lipstick and this color for about 7 years. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I love this color, but it is too sheer and seems to be gone in an hour, even if i don't eat. I wish they made this color in lip dye.
customer_reviews.author: nincin

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I felt the lipstick a was a tad old based on crayon like scent...although very faint. (I have purchased NARS lipsticks at department stores and never encountered this issue). The color is very sheer: more like a tinted lip balm instead of a lipstick, per se. Give time to "melt" on lips and a faint shimmer and slight shine appears. I think NARS discontinued this line of lipstick... since great price here and not available on NARS website. Personally speaking, I have gotten just as good or better lipsticks than this at the drugstore. Good shipping though. Lipstick did arrive new and unopened. Just remember: very sheer tint and very subtle shimmer. Perhaps, that is what you are looking for..
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Vanderpool

customer_reviews.title: I Like This Alot!
customer_reviews.text: I like this lipstick a lot. I got the new NARS lipstick in Autumn Leaves and I love the color! I decided to order this after I saw it in a fashion magazine as one of the hottest fall colors. It is a gorgeous red with small hints of gold shimmer and the teeniest hint of orange shimmer. I typically don't do lipsticks but I wanted to try it and I am glad I did. The reason I gave it four stars is because it doesn't stay on as long as I like but that is one of the reasons that I don't do lipsticks but I think everyone will agree that this color is just gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, natural color
customer_reviews.text: This shade has a very natural looking color. The only problem is that it doesn't stay on very long so I have to keep reapplying it after everything. It has a nice matte finish and is very creamy.
customer_reviews.author: lkat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful color! It wears smoothly and I love how it looks, especially with a little bit of Turkish Delight lipgloss on top of it. :) A beautiful pink color for any color of skin.
customer_reviews.author: LovesHistorical

customer_reviews.title: Dolce Vita is Perfect Natural Lip Color
customer_reviews.text: Dolce vita is the perfect natural lip color! It matches my lips perfectly! It also has staying power. I like to put a gloss over it because it is thicker and not a glossy lipstick. But the color is your lips only better! I've been searching for this color forever! I love this lipstick!
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick
customer_reviews.text: NARS makes the best lipstick in many great colors, period. Gloss and the shiny, oily lipsticks do not work for me. I am a lipstick girl and I want my lipstick to stay on for more than 30 minutes after application. I own many NARS lipsticks and love all of them.
customer_reviews.author: divashopper

customer_reviews.title: Sexy color...needs lots of applications
customer_reviews.text: I talk a lot and have big lips - I think its a deadly combo for most lipsticks, so this doesn't last great, but i paired it with a nude lipliner and laura gellar lip primer, and that definately helps it last. I have no problem re-applying...and this is a great nude. I'm irish/italian, so the right combo of pale/red/tan skin (depending on the season) and black hair and it works for me. Again - only complaint is "last-ability" but very pretty neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. MLB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than expected but I can always blend it with another shade. .
customer_reviews.author: K. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shade....wish it would last longer without reapply !
customer_reviews.author: Delores P.

customer_reviews.title: Love the natural look and the moisture
customer_reviews.text: Love the soft shade of dark rose of this lipstick. I've been buying it for over 8 years and everyone makes nice comments about how natural it looks. It has plenty of moisturizer for my lips as well. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Fast Ride
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite now. I couldn't get Nars Russian Doll as I couldn't find it, so tried this. (Similar color) I like it even better. RD was opaque. This one is more clear & the color stays on well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice light color lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I really like Nars ! Goes on nicely, neutral smell & taste. Beautiful color that can be worn alone or over a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Joseph

customer_reviews.title: nice light lipstick
customer_reviews.text: goes on nicely. Beautiful light color on its own or a nice over lipstick used with a darker base. Neutral smell and taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nars is really a great brand. I buy all the neutral colors
customer_reviews.author: ARLady

customer_reviews.title: Great color, smooth feel
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love NARS lipstick. It just has a great feel on your lips. The color Roman Holiday is spectacular. I am not too crazy about the price and there are good alternatives. In particular, you might try L'Oreal Infallible LeRouge "Beyond Blushing"(very similar to NARS Roman Holiday) or "Perennial Pink" which is a little lighter shade of pink. I like NARS slightly more, but I really wonder if it's worth the extra $15.00 when the L'Oreal is so extremely similar.
customer_reviews.author: Pinhead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite color of lip stick. Especially good for redheads
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: I hope it's not being phased out....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect red for me. Not too brown, Not too pink. Nice coverage and feels moist on my lips. What more can you ask?
customer_reviews.author: ejg

customer_reviews.title: great color
customer_reviews.text: I am a strawberry blonde and this lipstick is smooth and not sticky or heavy but rich in color. I also like how they suggest what lip pencil goes with which lipstick. love love love NARS!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Life is sweet
customer_reviews.text: Dolce Vita is such a great, neutral color choice. My first one ever was a gift from a friend some 10 years ago and I thought, what was she thinking that's not my color - I was wrong, I have tried other colors from NARS and others but this one remains my #1 choice. The lipstick lasts so I put it on in the morning and maybe reapply once during the day.
customer_reviews.author: kaufrausch

customer_reviews.title: Great choice of red for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: Great color of red for everyday use.......not overly dramatic! It goes on smoothly and doesn't run.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color - goes on smooth, no lumps, has lightweight feel on lips.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color, sheer brownish grape, great on Asian skin. Is sort of shiny but wears well.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Choy

customer_reviews.title: sheer and hidratating
customer_reviews.text: great lipstick, it gives you a sheer but builtible color pay off, also very hidratating so you wont need a lipalm underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Aymara

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The lipstick was amazing! The color wasn't too dramatic and goes along with any type of make up you have on. Shipping arrived at a reasonable time and the price I paid for this product and shipping all together was pretty reasonable also. At the store this lipstick alone is around $23-25 so I thought this was a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: thoak90

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks as advertised, subtle but pretty, and arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, fast delivery and the order was right! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: zharleygirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect versatile lipstick
customer_reviews.text: My fair- friend used this color and I am light/medium complexion. This is a workhorse of a color. Definitely more affordable that dept store cosmetic counter. I love how you can control the color by applying light or applying more for a more sultry look. I will probably hoarde this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Bean

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. this is such a very cute lip stick color. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Temsuk

customer_reviews.title: Natural color pago pago lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I like the consistency and it doesn't feel greasy or gritty on my lips. Feels like a moisturizer without the artificial shiny look. As one ages, you need the "make down look" instead of the "make up look". Too much makeup and dark colors, make you look even older that you are. I am in my 70's and always told I have beautiful skin (which, of course, is helped by some products). That is just the kind of compliment that I enjoy hearing - not that my makeup looks good.
customer_reviews.author: BobbiB

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! Not as dark as it looks! I was very excited when I tried it on! It's my new go to color!
customer_reviews.author: Marge L Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lipstick that enhances your natural lip color.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to everyday lip color. It's very natural looking and whether I am matching it with a smokey eye look, or just some eyeliner and mascara, it makes my lips look fuller and I really enjoy the natural rosy color. It can be pricey but I think it is worth it for the quality that you get.
customer_reviews.author: donatellex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nude lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Great nude color, you can wear it over lipliner, under gloss, or alone. Slightly small for the price. But I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: I love my Lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that my order arrived in a timely manner. Love the packaging by sender, and I'm just all around happy with the Lipstick! This was a great buy and I'm about to put in a another order soon.
customer_reviews.author: a.lose

customer_reviews.title: NARS Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: The NARS lipstick in MITZI is very pretty. I did not expect the color -when worn - to be so sheer. The color wears much lighter than it appears.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Neutral
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a neutral lipstick for years until I tried this product which was recommended by Allure's magazine for "What's IN right now!" I am highly satisfied that I don't have to keep searching for the right shade anymore. This is simply amazing!
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Staple Pink
customer_reviews.text: Love this shade! Super pretty for day or night. Nice on fair or dark skin.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix's Mom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LIPSTICK!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lipstick, it goes on so well, the only thing is that it doesn't last that long, but it still works really nice, i love the color. :O)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Veronica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: good color / cruising
customer_reviews.text: Great Color = this is a very light neutral pinkish brown color that is complimentary to all skin colors. I love NARS lipsticks and have been happy with all the colors I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Zapalski

customer_reviews.title: color and feel was not ideal.  Barely showed on lips
customer_reviews.text: horrible. So sheer and gritty. would not recommend this particular color.Looked cheap on. Not the normally rich looking Nars colors I am used to
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and stick with lip pencil of the same name
customer_reviews.text: Did not even seem the color of the lip pencil with same name which I love ! Can hardly see color . Disappointing for the expensive price ! Their Dolce Vita lip pencil is much nicer .
customer_reviews.author: Karen Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Too Brown
customer_reviews.text: The lipstick is OK but the color is more brown than it looks on line--not very flattering for light complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley P.

customer_reviews.title: This color is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick! With my fair skin and thinner lips, I have been afraid to try lipstick because I always look clowny. This color is perfect. A shade or so darker than my normal lip color, it makes me look professional and is good for going out. Great for women who want to still look natural, yet put together.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Edmiston

customer_reviews.title: Everyday lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. It's a "my lips but better" lipstick. It is also very silky and the color is just right for everyday use. I also get a nice stain off it as it wears. Will buy again! Also--- I am a natural redhead and it's hard for "us" to fins lipsticks that work. This is one of them!
customer_reviews.author: AMWord

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color. Goes with anything.
customer_reviews.text: Falbala goes on the same color as is shown, but it is more like a sheer, creamy stain. (Sounds contradictory, but that's what it's like.) I have olive skin that tans medium well. This color is perfect for my skin tone; it shows up but is not bright. It feels moisturizing. Goes with anything I'm wearing. If I had to have only one lipstick, this would be it.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This Is my favorite lipstick, and the seller is out pricing others (on Amazon and local). Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: My very favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick and use it for ears so far. Pricey a bit, but quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color and it does moisturize as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I have cool lips with slight pigmentation on the corners
customer_reviews.text: I have cool lips with slight pigmentation on the corners. While this is a sheer lipstick, the coverage is still lovely & it works with my warm (medium dark/tan South Asian) skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Manasi

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shade of pink
customer_reviews.text: I'm a winter/cold color person where pink is not really part of my color palette. So you can imagine how difficult it was for me to find just the right shade and how excited I was when I found it. Yep, dolce vita is just the right shade of pink for my skin coloring and is moisturizing enough not to dry out my lips. I'm a NARS fan!!!
customer_reviews.author: Misty May

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the lipstick. I use it all the time. I just wish it was a little creamier. It makes my lips look dry. Also, it doesn't stay on very long. I add a little clear lip gloss over my lips after putting the Nars on. I need a little more moisture.
customer_reviews.author: graplekid

customer_reviews.title: Way too pinky for me
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a really great pale PEACH. This is way too pinky for me. Back to the search for a true peach! I got Barbarella
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, if a bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, if a bit expensive. It's a hard to find color, shifts from deep red to deep rose, depending on what you're wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casual and formal
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick for it's capability to suit for multiple occasions. I can wear it when I'm just out with some friends during the day, at work, or at night. It really adds a slight red-orange lightness to your lips, and it stays moist! (my lips tend to get dry after wearing lipstick for a few hours) It's really a great color - I recommend this to anyone looking for something casual yet classy.
customer_reviews.author: MissNightsky

customer_reviews.title: Nice balance of color and subtlety
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely, light and sheer lipstick. It gives just enough dark-ish color without looking hard. And it's sheer enough that, when it begins to wear off, it isn't visibly obvious.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Tala

customer_reviews.title: Okay but kind of pricey
customer_reviews.text: It's okay....never tried NARS before and I think it's kind of overpriced. The color is hard to see online. It's not too dry or waxy, wears comfortably but you do need to keep reapplying.
customer_reviews.author: Vanthia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sheer color
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but worth it. I have bought so many lipsticks before that looked different on. It looks like the color that is advertised and is sheer, without frost. Seems like a lot of lipsticks have frost, not crazy about that. Loved it so much, I ordered a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Thome

customer_reviews.title: Great color and quality NARS product
customer_reviews.text: Great color and quality NARS product. Didn't realize it was going to be as 'sheer' as it was. Thought it would've lasted longer than it does. Next time I'll get more matte finish. Now I just use it as a gloss over other colors.
customer_reviews.author: patricia watkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sheer red - I am not normally a red lipstick girl, more pinks, but this sheer color is gorgeous and light - I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jinx

customer_reviews.title: Best lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand and color for lipstick! I search to find it at the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal reader

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lipstick but
customer_reviews.text: The actual lipstick inside the tube detached itself from the tubing & got stuck to the inside of the lid. I'm not sure if this was during delivery or what but when I opened the lipstick tube I had to actually pull the lipstick portion from the off the inside of the lid resulting in the top of the lipstick getting messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Maria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lipstick. It looks like I.m not wearing lipstick when I am
customer_reviews.author: Darcie Covington

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color from NARS
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin (with a cool undertone) and red hair, and it has always been difficult for me to find a good nude lipcolor. Although the lipstick looks really dark in the packaging, it is actually a shade darker than a true nude- but can be layered to go darker and darker. You could in fact make it as dark as the color it appears to be if you wanted. It's a very versatile shade, and, I think, would look good on just about anyone. Also, NARS makes some of the best lipsticks around. Nourishing and lasts longer than average.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah & James

customer_reviews.title: Neutral for Anyone
customer_reviews.text: Goes on very smoothly, not sticky like gloss or thick like some lipsticks. The color is a nice neutral, not too dark or so light as to be ghostly. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd in Fort Washington, MD

customer_reviews.title: The lipstick is beautiful, definitely met my
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered on time, well packaged. The lipstick is beautiful, definitely met my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Radermacher

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick! This was a reorder. It is long- lasting and the color and texture are outstanding. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Babsie

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing, doesn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: silky moisturizing lipstick that comes in many colors. The sheer needs frequent application, so that I go without lipstick all day since I don't have time to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo39

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Nars is like an old friend - you can never go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Own several different shades of NARS lipstick, Gipsy works best with my skin tone and goes well with any outfit.
customer_reviews.text: My go-to lipstick, one at home, one in purse and one in car.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Chan

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: The colors you offer are beautiful, and they last. Elegant packaging and on time. Don't forget the rest of the product line too. I have had very good luck.
customer_reviews.author: donnakelley

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expect it!
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautifull!!! HOWEVER,you have to reapply it more than once to get the coral color..for the price i was expecting a little more
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Really love the color. I always get compliments whenever I wear this lipstick. You will not be disappointed. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: My lips, but better
customer_reviews.text: I love this color, love the formula. It's easy to wear- feels like lip balm. I will buy this again when I use it up!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Best all-around lipstick ever
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I have put up with tube after tube of dry, orangey, overly bright or just plain drab lipsticks that clutter up my drawers and purses. Now that I have found NARS Dolce Vita I will never need another. It is creamy soft, feels incredibly smooth and moisturizing, and offers just a hint of color. More than just a "nude," the color goes with probably 98% of everything I wear. Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lipstick. It goes on very smoothly and doesn't dry your lips out. The shade is very close to my natural lip color but just a little more color (which was what i was hoping for).
customer_reviews.author: Jbarton18

customer_reviews.title: Very nice color and creamy texture
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color and creamy texture. Hoping to pick up another tube soon to keep in my desk at work.
customer_reviews.author: beth keehne

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Color is perfect and lipstick is not too heavy, easy application. I would buy it again and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Bozena Kostelic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick! It goes on smoothly and the color is just right.
customer_reviews.author: TBrown

customer_reviews.title: Love Nars products
customer_reviews.text: I have been using their products for a number of years. Loved the color and the feel of the lipstick on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color (Dolce Vita) on fair skin...not as much staying power as expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color (Dolce Vita) on fair skin...healthy, silky feeling lipstick, but needs many re-applications. The only reason not 5-star is because it did not last as long as it should given the price ($24).
customer_reviews.author: HannP

product_meta.title: NARS Sheer Lipstick, Gipsy
product_meta.description: Color:GipsyA wide range of captivating shades designed to provide the look and style the color dictates. NARS lipstick is available in three formulas.
feature_bullets: Nourishing and Non-drying, with Vitamin E
Fashionable colors available in three textures
